website_summaries.verdict: The Pandigital Personal Scanner (S8X1100) is small and light, offers a manual feed, and doesn't need a computer to scan, but it needs a power socket or USB port for power.
cons: Included optical character recognition software is highly limited

customer_reviews.title: Copied 120 photos in 15 minutes and looked as good as the originals
customer_reviews.text: One of the most efficient items I have ever used transferring my pictures from photos to electronic devices. Copied 120 photos in 15 minutes and looked as good as the originals. I would suggest this item to anyone wanting to save photographs before they fade.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O Trainor

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE !!!!! this little sucker. I am now the ScannZILLA! perfect for traveling, I scan now everything that I can. Super portable. I always carry on with me a external USB battery pack, it works well with it.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This item works very well. I had a bit of a struggle with the software but I installed it in Windows 7. The copies are clear and accurate. Very handy. :<)j Thanks and good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Thom

customer_reviews.title: DIS-HEARTED
customer_reviews.text: I give this wand scanner a 1 star for the fact that it scans fast and easy to use, BUT all my pictures have lines running thru them and so the wand just sits here staring at me and I'm thinking what am I doing wrong?
customer_reviews.author: JENNIE

customer_reviews.title: Is not the same product.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, this is not the same product that is advertised. It is very similar but is not the same -- it is weird because it says it is Pandigital but the model is Sunglow S8X1100. I found out online that the product is this one: [...] It looks like Sunglow bought Pandigital in September. I tested it with several pictures and they are ok, but far from high quality. I am returning this right away. Will contact the seller to get a clarification.
customer_reviews.author: R2D2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the one I've had for two years. It worked great and scanned thousands of photos and documents. Lived a good life, but I think it was a natural death, just worn out. Can't live without a scanner like this even though my printer will also scan.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but can be a little hit-or-miss with detecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but can be a little hit-or-miss with detecting the size of certain items. We tried to scan some drawings and certificates and it sometimes crops where it shouldn't. Overall a nice scanner for photos and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: I bought these which i thought were new but both ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these which i thought were new but both were clearly use 1 had paper stuck in it and both need to be cleaned inside to get clear copies but i got them both to work and i felt the price was that of used ones anyway
customer_reviews.author: Audrey DeMarino

customer_reviews.title: Buy It Now
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I am a teacher and have to upload documents for grades, and this makes it quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Very handy little scanner
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner. Easily scans pictures and documents in seconds. Great portability.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA HARTMAN

customer_reviews.title: ... stopped working and replaced it because it is the best, fastest scanner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Had one that stopped working and replaced it because it is the best, fastest scanner I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: ASK

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the scans was not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS PRODUCT. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: It worked two times and now nothing will scan and it constantly blinks red when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gyamfi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely, but not as great of quality as I was expecting it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Very happy with the performance and the fast ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very happy with the performance and the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Taylor-Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use, but it is very slow when scanning at higher resolution.
customer_reviews.author: cardinalsfan71

customer_reviews.title: ... i telly need it for but if it's one better then this let me
customer_reviews.text: It actually worked I only need to scan paper and it work just as well as the high price ones so for I have not scan paper with it but I'm going to try it out that's what i telly need it for but if it's one better then this let me KNOW
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nealy

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good scanner. Very easy to use. Plug and play with the Mac. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Photo Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a very great product. It scans the pictures very good. I am enjoying scanning my pictures. I have not had to clean the scanner very much. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Collins

customer_reviews.title: Desent qualitiy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used is to much yet but so far I like it. I already had the smaller version and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Every picture scanned had visible lines, regardless of the dpi. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

product_meta.title: Pandigital Hand-Held Wand Scanner S8X1100
product_meta.description: 8" x 11", 900dpi TWIN ROLLER sheet-feed operated. Colors Plate option [White], [5 in 1] SD card Reader - SD/MS/MS-PRO/MMC/XD. micro-USB 2.0/Bus Power. Output to JPG/PDF store in Flash (128MB), card reader, or direct PC/Mac USB 2.0 Scanner.
feature_bullets: One Touch Control - Easily scan documents or photos, up to 8.5"x11", directly to the memory card
High Resolution - Images are scanned up to 900 dpi and can be saved as JPEG or PDF files
Fast and Fun - Scans twice as fast as last year's models and comes with interchangeable color plates

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars30 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
